svcproc.title: OPERATION
svcproc.para: Vehicles equipped with the tilt adjust steering wheel column will have a control lever located on the left side of the column below the turn signal switch ( Figure 2). To adjust the steering column, pull the lever up and move the column to the desired position. Then return the lever to the lock position.
